actions.name: List API versions
actions.description:
Lists information about all Compute
 API versions.

responses.body:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>
<choices xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom"
 xmlns="http://docs.openstack.org/common/api/v1.0">
 <version status="EXPERIMENTAL" id="v3.0">
 <media-types>

 type="application/vnd.openstack.compute+json;version=3"
 />
 </media-types>
 <atom:link href="http://23.253.228.211:8774/v3/.xml"
 rel="self"/>
 </version>
 <version status="CURRENT" id="v2.0">
 <media-types>
 <media-type base="application/xml"
 type="application/vnd.openstack.compute+xml;version=2"/>
 <media-type base="application/json"
 type="application/vnd.openstack.compute+json;version=2"
 />
 </media-types>
 <atom:link href="http://23.253.228.211:8774/v2/.xml"
 rel="self"/>
 </version>
</choices>

actions.description:
Shows details for Compute API
 v2.

actions.name: Delete server
actions.description: Deletes a specified server.

tenant_id.description:
The tenant ID in a
 multi-tenancy cloud.

actions.name: Show server metadata
actions.description:
Shows metadata for a specified
 server.

actions.name: Create or replace server metadata
actions.description:
Creates or replaces metadata for a
 specified server.
 Replaces items that match the specified keys. If you
 omit a key that already exists, the key retains its
 value.
 If the number of metadata items exceeds the quota
 for metadata items, an overLimit
 (413) fault might be
 thrown.

actions.name: Update server metadata items
actions.description:
Updates metadata items by key for a
 specified server.
 Replaces items that match the specified keys and
 does not modify items not specified in the
 request.
 An overLimit (413) fault
 might be thrown if the operation causes the quota for
 metadata items to be exceeded.

tenant_id.description:
The tenant ID in a
 multi-tenancy cloud.

key.description:
A string. Maximum length is
 255 characters.

actions.name: Show server metadata item details
actions.description:
Shows details for a metadata item
 by key for a specified server.

actions.name: Create or update server metadata item
actions.description:
Sets a metadata item by key for a
 specified server.
 An overLimit (413) fault
 might be thrown if the operation causes the quota for
 metadata items to be exceeded.

actions.name: Delete server metadata item
actions.description:
Deletes a metadata item by key for
 a specified server.

actions.name: Resize server
actions.description:
Resizes the specified server.
 Specify the resize action in the request
 body.

actions.name: Confirm resized server
actions.description:
Confirms a pending resize action.
 Specify the confirmResize action in the
 request body.

actions.name: Revert resized server
actions.description:
Cancels and reverts a pending
 resize action. Specify the revertResize
 action in the request body.

actions.name: Create image
actions.description:
Creates a new image. Specify the
 createImage action in the request
 body.

resources.name: Image list
resources.description:
A list of images. Each image contains IDs, names,
 and links. Other attributes are omitted.

actions.name: List images
actions.description:
Lists IDs, names, and links for
 available images.

actions.name: Create or replace image metadata
actions.description:
Creates or replaces metadata for a
 specified image.
 Replaces items that match the specified keys. If you
 omit a key that already exists, this key retains its
 value.
 If the number of metadata items exceeds the quota
 for metadata items, an overLimit
 (413) fault might be
 thrown.

actions.name: Update image metadata items
actions.description:
Updates metadata items by key for a
 specified image.
 Replaces items that match the specified keys and
 does not modify items not specified in the
 request.
 An overLimit (413) fault
 might be thrown if the operation causes the quota for
 metadata items to be exceeded.

responses.body:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>
<metadata xmlns="http://docs.openstack.org/compute/api/v1.1">
 <meta key="kernel_id">False</meta>
 <meta key="ramdisk_id">nokernel</meta>
 <meta key="Label">UpdatedImage</meta>
 <meta key="architecture">x86_64</meta>
 <meta key="auto_disk_config">True</meta>
</metadata>

key.description:
A string. Maximum length is
 255 characters.

actions.name: Show image metadata item details
actions.description:
Shows details for a metadata item
 by key for a specified image.

responses.body:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>
<metadata xmlns="http://docs.openstack.org/compute/api/v1.1">
 <meta key="kernel_id">nokernel</meta>
 <meta key="auto_disk_config">True</meta>
 <meta key="ramdisk_id">nokernel</meta>
 <meta key="architecture">x86_64</meta>
</metadata>

actions.name: Create or update image metadata item
actions.description:
Creates or updates a metadata item
 by key for a specified image.
 An overLimit (413) fault
 might be thrown if the operation causes the quota for
 metadata items to be exceeded.

actions.name: Delete image metadata item
actions.description:
Deletes a metadata item by key for
 a specified image.
